r.s: Extension for the Ingres Relational Database System.
r.d: This extension supports the Ingres Relational Database System.
r.n: This is a minor release that introduces the following new functionality: - Add ingres.fetch_buffer_size to configure to the number of rows ingres_query() will fetch. - Add ingres_charset() to fetch the installation II_CHARSETxx value - Add ingres.describe ini setting to allow disabling of DESCRIBE INPUT if desired - Add support for DESCRIBE INPUT - Add ingres_escape_string() - Add ingres_result_seek() to support row positioning
